aircraft.value: Goliath Lift - AC-5468-604 at Zone-4 Facility

defect_observed.value: Fuel nozzle blockage. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Engine Control component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 04/11/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 06/11/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 06/11/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 08/11/2024 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 11/11/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai
